General.Name: TMT Steel Public Company Limited
General.Description: TMT Steel Public Company Limited trades in and transforms structural steel, plates, and sheets primarily in Thailand. The company offers flat products, including hot rolled sheets and plates, flat bars, slitting coils, and checkered plates; and cold forming products, including round, rectangular, square, primer coated, and galvanized steel tubes, as well as API and ASTM pipes, primer coated and galvanized c channels, and light channels and angles. It also provides hot formed steel products, such as H-sections, cut-beams, I-sections, channels, equal angels, round bars, and deformed bars. The company was formerly known as Thai Metal Trade Public Company Limited. TMT Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
